text: Jiang Chunyun (; April 1930 â€“ 28 August 2021) was a Chinese politician. He was a member of the Chinese Communist Party. Jiang was born in Shandong, China. From 1987 until 1989, he was the Governor of Shandong. From 1995 until 1998, he was the Vice Premier of the People's Republic of China. Jiang died on 28 August 2021 in Beijing at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:20th-century Chinese politicians Category:People from Shandong
title: Jiang Chunyun
